dcterms:description: The short text conversation (STC) dataset from NTCIR-12 was used in our experiments. This dataset was crawled from Chinese Sina Weibo. The dataset contains 1,800,000 post-response pairs, where one post corresponds to an average of 19 responses. It is appropriate for studying diverse text generation methods.
dcterms:title: Short Text Conversation (STC) Dataset
